tool_description: Normalizes operating cash flows by adjusting for non-recurring items and working capital fluctuations.
error_messages: Array length mismatch: Operating cash flow and working capital changes must have same number of periods.
Insufficient periods: At least 2 periods required for normalization analysis.
Extreme volatility: Cash flows show unusual volatility that may require additional analysis.
Data consistency: Cash flow data should align with income statement and balance sheet changes.
usage: Input historical operating cash flows and working capital changes, with optional non-recurring items. Tool provides normalized cash flow metrics.

cash_flow_quality.description: Assessment of cash flow quality and sustainability
